Under normal circumstances, the fund invests at least 80% of the assets in equity securities of companies whose equity securities have a total market value of under $500,000,000. Equity securities consist of common stock, preferred stock and securities convertible into common or preferred stock. It emphasizes a "value" style of investing. In deciding which securities to buy and which to sell, the Advisor will give primary consideration to fundamental factors. Chart  vs. S&P 500  vs. Category 3 month6 month1 year3 year5 year10 year
